content:
# Proficiency roles
Select one of the following roles to change your proficiency level

options.label: Native
options.description: If greek is your native language

options.label: Cypriot
options.description: If cypriot greek is your native language

options.label: Beginner
options.description: If you just started learning greek or your level is A1

options.label: Elementary
options.description: If your greek level is A2

options.label: Intermediate
options.description: If your greek level is B1

options.label: Upper Intermediate
options.description: If your greek level is B2

options.label: Advanced
options.description: If your greek level is C1

options.label: Fluent
options.description: If your greek level is C2

options.label: Non Learner
options.description: If you don't know greek and you don't want to learn it
